electro dubstep ambient music there are

and to be completely honest I was kind

starting tracks pull from a lot of

rumbling bass squawking glitching
buzzing some of the beats are really

high quality sounds and great production
it wasn't the most immaculate thing that
I heard but it got the job done but my

interrupted by all of these vocal

samples taken from political
conversations philosophical discussions
Bates I really didn't know whether or
not monopoly was trying to get me to

and I was getting really afraid that
this album might just thanks but this

before the halfway point at this spot
monopoly just basically says okay you

our peji ating since just floating in

sort of like looking at dust just

what what whoa that's like that except

is monopoly wears several different

kind of led to a disjointed debut album
I can't say it amazed at this point he's
kind of sounding like a mini flying
lotus to me but he's clearly got good
taste he's got good production chops and
with those two things alone and
diligence this guy could quite possibly
